      • getID

        public int getID()
        The ID is an unique number for each card. Can't exist two card of the SAME DECK with the same ID. If the decks are different there may be the same ID.
        Specified by:
        getID in interface Card
        Returns:
        The unique ID of the card.

      • getIDtype

        public int getIDtype()
        The ID Type isn't unique for each card. It is the same for the card with the same status, so for the card which has the same color of ammo.
        Specified by:
